name: Hollow Bowman
flavor: None of the skills it had in life were lost in death.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, destroy all opposing green dice.

name: Hellbound Legionnaire
flavor: A prototype weapon acquired from Olous, he launches a surprise attack on unsuspecting soldiers.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, put the top card of your deck into your discard pile, and if it is a machine, choose an opposing creature, and destroy it.

name: Steelforged Cragborn
flavor: Built with the most sophisticated technologies, its combat prowess far surpasses its brethren.

name: Entrancing Stoneweaver
flavor: She animates stone carvings to do her bidding.
ability: [ACT] [Siphon Black 3] Choose a cost 2 creature from your discard pile, and summon it. At the end of your turn, put that creature on the bottom of your deck. This ability can only be used once per turn. (To Siphon Black 3, reduce the value of one of your black dice by 3.)

name: Junkheap Gargoyle
flavor: The grave cannot hold it.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is put into your discard pile from your deck, if you have a black banner, you may summon it.

name: Banetalon Temptress
flavor: Her claws are dipped in venom, and even the slightest scratch will result in an agonizing death.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, discard a card from your hand.

name: Mooncursed Hunter
flavor: The moon shows them for what they truly are.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, if it was not played from your hand, your opponent discards a card from their hand at random.

name: Noxious Rotwhale
flavor: Its allies dive for cover as it approaches, and its enemies scatter when they catch a whiff of its approach.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is destroyed, choose one of your creatures, and destroy it.

name: Seeker of Dark Truth
flavor: His experiments are gruesome, even by Niflheim's standards.
ability: [AUTO] When your other demon or goblin is summoned from your hand, you may choose a goblin from your discard pile, and return it to your hand. This ability only activates once per turn.

name: Raving Dead
flavor: Their march is never-ending.

name: Unholy Alliance
flavor: A pact made in the darkest depths of the abyss.
ability: Look at five cards from the top of your deck, put up to one demon and up to one goblin from among them into your hand, and put the rest of the cards into your discard pile. The next demon or goblin you play this turn costs 3 less to play.

name: Scorn
flavor: "Surely you can do better than that, Holy Lord."
ability: Choose an opposing creature, and destroy it. If the destroyed creature had 4 or more endurance, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

name: Mortal Wound
flavor: Injuries inflicted by cursed weapons will never heal.
ability: Choose a creature that was dealt damage this turn, and destroy it.

name: Tempting Offer
flavor: "Can I go with you? You seem like a good man."
ability: Choose an opposing cost 3 or less creature or an opposing cost 7 or less yellow or green creature, and destroy it.

name: Altar of Dark Machinations
flavor: All hail the machine gods.
ability: Put up to six machines from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. For every two cards put on the bottom of your deck, choose a card in your resource zone, and [STAND] it.

name: The Citadel of Logres
flavor: A symbol of all that is good and just.

name: The Haven of Tir na Nog
flavor: A retreat for all who seek shelter.

name: The Ruins of Olous
flavor: A testament to the growth of knowledge.

name: The March of Tauris
flavor: A fearsome host that advances without rest.

name: The Burg of Niflheim
flavor: A city of never-ending depravity.
